articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Kaylie Ann York, 23, passed away when her 2015 Mazda 6 crossed into the westbound lane and struck a 2019 Toyota Tacoma head-on on Garden Valley Rd near Ridgewood Dr on Aug. 8, 2025. The Tacoma driver, Frank Edward Pollak, 66, sustained serious but non-life-threatening injuries.
articles.title: Roseburg Woman Killed, Driver Injured In Garden Valley Road Head-On Crash

articles.author: News Staff
articles.description: Firefighters made significant strides in battling fires across the Douglas District over the weekend.
articles.title: Douglas District reminds public of extreme fire danger after recent blazes

articles.description: A 23-year-old Roseburg woman died Friday morning following a two-vehicle, head-on crash in Douglas County, according to the Oregon State Police.
articles.title: Roseburg woman dies in two-vehicle, head-on Douglas County crash
